description: Engage™ is a free, open-access energy system planning tool that allows multiple users/stakeholders to develop and collaborate on capacity expansion models. The tool, developed at the National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL), provides a collaborative and easy-to-use interface built on Calliope, a multi-scale energy systems modeling framework. Visit the NREL hosted webtool at https://engage.nrel.gov/
name: Engage™: A Calliope Web Environment for Collaborative Energy Systems Modeling and Planning
